post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
CA-ON-Toronto/GTA-Senior J2EE Developer :.
Status: Full Time, Employee Salary: CAD 68,000.00 to CAD 70,000.00 per year Reference Code: Senior J2EE Developer
ENGINEERING.com Incorporated [CDNX: EGN] is the developer-owner of the www.ENGINEERING.com Web site and Internet-based software and business, being developed to become the ultimate resource tool for the global engineering community and to provide a leading business-to-business Internet marketplace for engineering products and services. We are currently looking for a Senior J2EE Developer. The candidate will be responsible to develop, integrate, document and deploy e-business applications in a J2EE environment using WebSphere tools and technologies.
The minimum job specific requirements are as follows:
?College/University Degree in Computer Science or equivalent ?Minimum 4 years experience in Java ?Experience in J2EE development using structured methodologies for development, design implementation and maintenance of applications ?Experience with package system implementations ?Experience with high volume/high availability systems preferably in an applications service provider environment ?Experience with the use of information retrieval packages using SQL ?Experience with DB2 technologies
Bonus Requirements are as follows:
?Experience with Lotus technologies ?Experience with MQ series ?Strong Visual Basic ?Biztalk experience an asset on integration projects ?Deployment experience with IBMxSeries hardware and Linux (RedHat) OS
We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package. Qualified candidates are invited to forward their r?um?with salary expectations to ENGINEERING.com? Corporate Human Resources at websphere@engineering.com
NO FAXES PLEASE!
We thank all applicants in advance for their interest but only those applicants who are to be considered will be contacted.
ENGINEERING.com is an equal opportunity employer.
.................................................................................................................................................................... Contact Information :. Roger Smith websphere@engineering.com ENGINEERING.com
post.title: Senior J2EE Developer
